ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Calling All Heroes
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks Su As for the new expansion I m looking forward to it I like the idea that I ll be able to actually hydra with some of my really lower level alts that i
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Su

As for the new expansion I'm looking forward to it

I like the idea that I'll be able to actually hydra with some of my really
lower level alts that i have and still be able to get xp with em.

The idea of being a monster sounds pretty kewl as well

As for the Intelligent Weapons. Kinda makes me think of the sword that
Cyric from the Forgotten Realms Avatar Series had =)


----- Original Message -----
From: "Su" <suceress@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 03, 2005 12:14 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Calling All Heroes


> Cool!
> By the way, what does everyone think of the new expansion that is coming
> out?
> luv,
> -Su
